sentences.sentence: I came from a family that was decidedly oddball you know.
sentences.translation: 你要知道，我的家人个个古怪得很。

sentences.sentence: His mother and father thought Jim was a bit of an oddball too.
sentences.translation: 吉姆的父母也认为他有些古怪。

sentences.sentence: My friend Joe is certainly an oddball.
sentences.translation: 这是说：“我的朋友乔真怪。”
